title: Sly as a Fox
description: Sylvia Wilsonâ€™s brother, Aaron, is working with a joint bank robbery task force. When he goes missing, she joins forces with the FBI to search for him.But nothing is what it seems.With very little time left, Sylvia will burn Heaven to the ground to find her missing brother and bring him back alive. FBI, be damned.
author: Wendy L. Koenig
